name: The Tiny Werewolf
description:
A demo game with a Halloween theme, The Tiny Werewolf features a werewolf's fight through the treacherous cultist caves to rid the surrounding town of the evil within before it hits midnight. Fight off cultists and make it to the end of the cave before the deadline or lose the town to the evil cultists for good.

Controls:

-WASD for movement
-Space for jump
-Right Click attack

Developed by: Eric Waugh, Charlie Davidson, Conner Workman, Bradley Dawn
